mapper.sql: id, code, name, moduleCode, authCode, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE cm_auth_operation
code = #{map.code},
name = #{map.name},
moduleCode = #{map.moduleCode},
authCode = #{map.authCode},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cm_auth_operation
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND code like CONCAT('%', #{code} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{name} , '%')
AND moduleCode like CONCAT('%', #{moduleCode} , '%')
AND authCode like CONCAT('%', #{authCode} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
